New Records: Nikola Jovic set a career-high with his first game off the bench, scoring 15 points and grabbing seven rebounds
Key Match Events: Nikola Jovic made a tying layup and go-ahead foul shot with 7.8 seconds left
Jaden McDaniels gave the Timberwolves the lead with a putback but the Heat responded
Tyler Herro set a career best with double-digit points in consecutive games
Pre-Game Insights: Timberwolves struggled initially with a 3-for-15 start from three-point range
Post-Match Reflections: Heat ended a three-game losing streak
Timberwolves' three-game winning streak was stopped
Miscellaneous Highlights: Heat made a season-best 14 steals and nine blocks
Timberwolves had 20 turnovers but managed 16 offensive rebounds
Others: Heat's Jaime Jaquez Jr. returned from a three-game absence due to illness
The game was played at Target Center in Minneapolis
